title: I see what u did there Riot
body:
give us all these "snowdown deals" and then upon closer inspection.... they are all for skins that we probably own a better or more favorable one for a champion. case in point, every single "deal" i got was a sale for  a champion I already had a skin I loved for them. I have also talked to a few others with the same thing.

Rito... y u do dis, just gib sales for champs we dun't have skins for yet plox ty
